item.title: This weekend at the Vortex: Reppy returns
item.description:
New York native and legendary Austin entertainer Reppy is returning to the Vortex Theater to perform her one-woman comedy show ReppyToire: A Tour de Farce this weekend, with a special performance happening tonight. This debut is the first of a trilogy — the next installments will happen in 2008. ReppyToire promises to be unique and sophisticated, free of hard-biting satire and risqu√© humor. Reppy’s old-fashioned humor creates an all-inclusive environment that breaks down social barriers.

read more
item.dc:creator: Michelle Inigo
